trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around February 25th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsthe weather has been bad so we havent gotten many chances lately. i have a point to make also. i have notice that when i report and incident here on the site, the jets will be out in droves. so when the jets come, the object will no longer fly around. i dont know where to begin. i saw a woman on utube being interview about a ufo that she had see in arkansas and she had some pictures of it. i saw the same thing from about 100yrds away on my way to work. it was about 5:40 am. hwy 7 entering camden, ar. from the south. the object apporached fast from the west on 376. it had red and green light so i took it to be a small single engine plane because there is a small air port near by. next it then did a 90 degree turn above the traffic light there it kinda tilted over ... really slowly....now i could see under it... this is when i saw that it also had a bright white light at the front and the back of the opject. the white lights was just above a red then a seperate green light. these lights were the identical color as the traffic signal. there was 1 bright white light at the front and the back seem to be more like a spot light, lighting up the area around it. i took it for a a large military copter then, but it wasnt making enough sound for me to hear it. it then went directly north up the street as if it was following the traffic lights. the object was less then 10 feet frome the traffic lights. then it took off and was far in the horizon in a matter 30 seconds. a co worker also saw it. also in feb i saw a star-like ufo. this one was out on a very cloudy night just after dark. u could not see a star in the sky because of the cloud cover. but u could see it very well moving slowly across the sky. another night in feb i was cooking in the back yard and a starlike come by.. this time i had my high power flash light handy and and shinned it on the object. at first it flickerd a lil... scared. i shinned the light back on the object.. this time it dimmed totally out. another night my wife calls and tell me to go out and see if i can get a glimps of 3 very bright lights in the sky. she is about 4 mins away from the house and could see the light in the sky... when she got there i told her that i could see nothing. we watch the sky for a few mins, like usual. then we see what looks to be a plane coming with the landing lights one. i dont pay it any attention, because im really assuming its a lane. when it gets dirrectly over us... from under the object.. we could see 3 triangle objects with a red light at each corner. u couldnt see the bright light anymore, just 3 triangles in a row going across the sky. we try to follow it to get a good picture of it but they were moving to fast... as soon as we get back to the house about 30mins later.. we see 3 more of the same objects, but this time they were in a triangle pattern. they kinda looked like the phoenix lights going by. we recent got hold of some binoculars. we really wanted to see what they looked like through them. so far we have only see the star like one... and they just look like balls of very bright light going across the sky. a perfectly round ball of intense white light ... that dimms when jets get near them..???
